attributes.action: Take back Sunday for armistice day
attributes.additional_details:
I think this is the one day in the year where I am proud to be british, grateful to those that fought for our freedom, and indebted to those that gave their lives so that we can live ours.

In remembrance of those brave people Armistice day should be the day that takes back sunday, close the supermarkets, shops, and shopping centres etc.

Make this one day extra special!!
